short_summary: Rideau Canal Corridor Maintenance Management Services
description: The National Capital Commission is seeking maintenance management services for the Rideau Canal corridor.
full_summary:
#### Rideau Canal Corridor Maintenance Management Services

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking a contractor to provide Maintenance Management Services for the Rideau Canal Corridor. This Request for Proposal (RFP) outlines the requirements for the provision of these services, which includes the management of seasonal maintenance activities, including but not limited to:

* Ornamental Shrub and Tree Service
* Forestry Services - Pruning, Felling, Seeding, etc.
* Diseased Tree Surgery or Removal
* Trash/Garbage Collection Services
* Landscaping and Horticultural Services
* Lawn and Garden Services
* Grounds Maintenance
* Snow Plowing and Removal

The contract term will be five (5) consecutive years beginning on April 1, 2023, and ending on March 31, 2028. Pursuant to the terms of the contract, the contractor and the NCC may exercise two (2) successive one (1) year options under the same terms and conditions, with an annual inflation increase of +2.0%.

### Accessing Tender Documents

All tender documents can be accessed through the Canadian Government's electronic tendering service at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca). The official language for tendering is English, but documents may be available in French.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method for this tender is competitive, with the best value between technical and financial proposals being sought. The contractor is expected to submit their proposal by September 20, 2022, at 3:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).
